title: Correction: Dominguez-Meijide et al. Pharmacological Modulators of Tau Aggregation and Spreading. Brain Sci. 2020, 10, 858.
abstract_text: There was an error in the original publication [...].

There was an error in the original publication [ 1 ]. References 34, 41, 52, 53, 56, 61, 64, 65, 68, 69, 71, 72, 74, 75, 76, 77, 81, 85, 86, 110, 112, and 114 were not the ones intended, and were unrelated with the main text. A correction has been made to References 34, 41, 52, 53, 56, 61, 64, 65, 68, 69, 71, 72, 74, 75, 76, 77, 81, 85, 86, 110, 112, and 114, and appear as follows: 34.
